ComicInfo.Title: Leaf it to Linus; The Piano-Eating Tree; Night's Watch
ComicInfo.Summary:
When Lucy throws Schroeder’s piano into the Kite-Eating Tree, Charlie Brown and Snoopy must find a way to save the instrument from being chomped. “The Piano-Eating Tree” and many more Peanuts adventures can be found in this month’s issue of all-out fun!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Donna Almendrala (d, c) | 1 | RE | "Kite-Eating Tree" First Appearance BOOM! Studios Exclusive Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Nomi Kane (d) | 2 |

ComicInfo.Inker: Charles M. Schulz, Donna Almendrala, Paige Braddock, Robert Pope
ComicInfo.Colorist: Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Katharine Efird, Lisa Moore, Nina Taylor Kester
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Rebecca Taylor, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Frieda, Kite-Eating Tree, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Peppermint Patty, Schroeder, Shermy, Snoopy, Woodstock
